MetadataItem Interface Reference

Provides methods for walking and querying the metadata. More...

Detailed Description

Provides methods for walking and querying the metadata.

Definition at line 665 of file Readium.idl.

Member Function Documentation

Object MetadataItem::findElements ( DOMString  namespace,
DOMString  elementName 
)

Recursively searches the current item and its children for the metadata item with the specified namespace and element name.

Returns an array of matching elements, where the array is of the form:

[
object,
object,
object
etc.
]

where the object implements the MetadataItem interface and wraps the matching element found.

Parameters
namespacethe namespace of the element
elementNamethe name of the element containng the property
Returns
an array of matching elements
Object MetadataItem::findMetaElements ( DOMString  namespace,
DOMString  propertyName 
)

Recursively searches the current item and its children for the meta element with the specified namespace and property name.

Returns an array of matching elements, where the array is of the form:

[
object,
object,
object
etc.
]

where the object implements the MetadataItem interface and wraps the matching element found.

Parameters
namespacethe namespace of the property
elementNamethe name of the the property
Returns
an array of matching elements
Object MetadataItem::getAttributes ( )

Returns an array of objects that is the complete set of attributes for this item, where the array is of the form:

[
{ ns:string, name:string, value:string },
{ ns:string, name:string, value:string },
{ ns:string, name:string, value:string }
etc.
]

where
ns is the fully qualified namespace
name is the short name of the attribute (without prefix or namespace)
value is the value of the attribute

Returns
an array of objects that hold the complete set of attributes
Object MetadataItem::getChild ( integer  index)

Returns the specified MetadataItem, if any.

Parameters
index0-based index of the item to be fetched
Returns
an object which implements the MetadataItem interface
integer MetadataItem::getChildCount ( )

Returns the number of children of this item.

Returns
the number of children of this item
Object MetadataItem::getNode ( )

Retrieve the actual DOM node wrapped by this item

Returns
the actual DOM node wrapped by this item
DOMString MetadataItem::getProperty ( )

Returns metadata item's property value, if any.

Returns
DOMString
DOMString MetadataItem::getRefines ( )

Returns the refines reference value, if any. Empty if none

Returns
the refine's reference value
DOMString MetadataItem::getValue ( )

Returns actual value (text child node) of the metadata item. This is a convenience function as the item could be fetched as a child of the current item as well.

Returns
DOMString
